snippet: A grandson of the creator of the Red Bull energy drink has been arrested after a Ferrari he was driving struck a police officer and dragged his dead body down a Bangkok street.
abstract: Vorayuth Yoovidhya, a grandson of the creator of the Red Bull energy drink, is arrested in Bangkok after a Ferrari he was driving struck a police officer and dragged his dead body down a street.
lead_paragraph: A grandson of the creator of the Red Bull energy drink has been arrested after a Ferrari he was driving struck a police officer and dragged his dead body down a Bangkok street.

headline.seo: Red Bull Heir Arrested in Traffic Death in Thailand
headline.main: Thailand: A Red Bull Heir Is Arrested in a Traffic Death
headline.print_headline: Thailand: A Red Bull Heir Is Arrested in a Traffic Death
